umbTextpage.bodyText:
21Vianet recently received a notice concerning public security website filing in Shanghai from the Shanghai Public Security Bureau. The content of the notice is as follows:

Last updated: March 2017

Notice on Public Security Website Filing in Shanghai

Dear user:

Hello!

In accordance with the provisions of Article Twelve of Administrative Measures for the Security Protection of Computer Information Networks Linked to the Internet (Ministry of Public Security Order No. 33), after filing successfully with the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology, each website is required to fulfill the public security filing procedure at the public security bureau local to a company’s actual place of business or an individual’s place of residence. Websites that have not conducted the public security filing procedure are requested to sign in to the National Public Security Bureau Internet Site Security Management Service Platform to submit an application for public security filing. If you need advice on public security filing matters, please contact the Internet Security Department at your local public security bureau. The contact telephone numbers are below.

If your filing location is Shanghai, please conduct public security website filing in accordance with the requirements of the above notice before March 31, 2017. If you fail to file within the specified time, our company will implement the relevant disciplinary measures (which include shutting down your service) according to laws and regulations. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Shanghai Blue Cloud Technology Co., Ltd.

March 15, 2017

Appendix One: Contact Details for Internet Security Departments of Public Security Bureaus in Every District and County of Shanghai

Administrative region Location External contact telephone number Administrative region Location External contact telephone number
Pudong New Area 800 Lingshan Road 021-22047852 Baoshan 199 Keshan Road 021-28950616
Huangpu 174 Jinling East Road 021-23033616 Minhang 800 Chundong Road 021-24062634
Jing'an 199 Datong Road 021-22041207 Jiading 1300 Yongsheng Road 021-22172595
Changning 201 Weining Road 021-23039907 Jinshan 110 Mengyuan Road 021-37990110 ext. 65027
Xuhui 901 Tianyaoqiao Road 021-23037398 Qingpu 485 Chengzhong North Road 021-59725207
Putuo Building 2, 110 Yichuan Six Village 021-22048988 Songjiang 270 Zhongshan East Road 021-24066732
Hongkou Building 2, 260 Minhang Road 021-22047852 Baoshan 199 Keshan Road 021-28950616
Yangpu 2049 Pingliang Road 021-22170451 Chongming Room 507, South Building, 2049 Pingliang Road 021-24060384

If you have any questions, you are welcome to contact our ICP filing support team between 9 AM and 6 PM on working days.

  • 400-089-0365

  • 010-84563652

Thanks for your attention!

21Vianet Microsoft Azure team, M5 Building, 1 Jiuxianqiao Road, Chaoyang District, Beijing (100015)
